A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: [No spoilers]\n\nAside from a lazy plot and completely dumped on all the films that came before it in a way I'm not sure they can recover from. This is pretty much a franchise killing film\, and that's really sad considering I've been a Star Wars fan since I was a kid. I really hope they ignore everything that happened in this film moving forward\, but I doubt it. It seems like they laid the groundwork for something new\, the problem is that something new isn't any good.
